_header: Come home sweet heart come home come home
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 320; cf. burden of 3394.
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lovers, absence/separation of; songs

BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
home swet hart cum homecum home swet hart cum home agaynfor
                    fallyn of the snow for & ceterafrost deyth freysse a lasye may not
                    cum home I trowecum home swet hart cum home
